com.aurel.track.fieldType.design

Class BaseFieldTypeNotRenderRequiredAndHistoryDT

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.fieldType.design.BaseFieldTypeDT
      • com.aurel.track.fieldType.design.BaseFieldTypeNotRenderRequiredAndHistoryDT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFieldTypeDT
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessLevelDT, SystemDurationDT, SystemWBSDT

    public class BaseFieldTypeNotRenderRequiredAndHistoryDT
extends BaseFieldTypeDT
    Some system fields does not need the required flag even if they are not required: for ex. superiorWorkitem or comment Also for priority and lastEditedBy: although they are required at database level accidentally they was marked as not required at TField table

    • Method Detail

      • renderRequiredFlag

        public boolean renderRequiredFlag()
        Whether by configuring a system or custom field the required checkbox should appear or not. It should not appear for the required system fields and for the types where this doesn't makes sense: ex. lables, checkboxes Overwrite it to return false for such fields
        Specified by:
        renderRequiredFlag in interface IFieldTypeDT
        Overrides:
        renderRequiredFlag in class BaseFieldTypeDT
        Returns:

      • renderHistoryFlag

        public boolean renderHistoryFlag()
        Whether the "History" check box should be rendered It should not be rendered for: 1. the status, start/end date (the explicit fields from the old history), and comment. They are forced by code to true. 2. some read only fields issueNo, originator, createDate, lastModifiedDate, accessLevel, lastEditedBy, archiveLevel They are forced by code to false
        Specified by:
        renderHistoryFlag in interface IFieldTypeDT
        Overrides:
        renderHistoryFlag in class BaseFieldTypeDT
        Returns:
